projects.title: Story Not Story
projects.description: ‚ÄúStory Not Story‚Äù is a group project I collaborated with other developers. It is a 3-web page that includes the Home page, Story or Profile Page, and the About Us Page. It creates a user profile and generates random stories based on user inputs. I mainly worked on designing the page, as well as taking part in some code in JavaScript.

projects.title: Gallery of Horns
projects.description: ‚ÄúGallery of Horns‚Äù is the first web application I created using React and Bootstrap. It allows the user to search for keywords (e.g., ‚Äúnarwhal,‚Äù ‚Äúunicorn,‚Äù ‚Äúrhino‚Äù), and the page will then display the images that match the keyword. It also allows the user to enter their name and age and sort the beasts/animals they would like to see by the number of horns.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: ‚ÄúSalmon Cookies ‚Äù is one of the websites that had me working on classes and prototypes, and it includes various computations in JavaScript. The Home Page contains information about the location and working hours. The Sales page provides information on salmon cookie sales per hour and day. It is a business website.
